revised_title: On the Propagation of Tremors over the Surface of an Elastic Solid
tldr: This paper investigates the propagation of tremors over the surface of an elastic solid, focusing on the effects of an impulse applied to the surface. The study examines the minor tremor and the main shock, discussing their time-scales, amplitudes, and velocities. The paper also includes subsidiary results and solutions for various cases, such as two-dimensional problems and simple-harmonic sources of disturbance.
